articles.description: A fish and chip shop in Swanage has closed its doors for good.
articles.content:
A fish and chip shop in Swanage has closed its doors for good.
 Harry Ramsdens in Station Road has shut down but fish-fanatics fear not - a new award-winning chip shop will be opening in its place.… [+1492 chars]
